game.name: Worker Riot
game.shortDescription: A worker who has been left without a salary is a dangerous opponent. Armed with a hammer, he will not leave them alone. Help him defeat them all. Beat out of them everything they owe you for your work
game.shortDescriptionEn: A worker who has been left without a salary is a dangerous opponent. Armed with a hammer, he will not leave them alone. Help him defeat them all. Beat out of them everything they owe you for your work

reviewHighlights.text: Game for achivements, not exciting gameplay really.
